AIM_REMOVED_MESSAGE_STRING.string: AIM support has been removed because our AIM library is no longer maintained and contains flaws. Please remove your account. Sorry!

ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: The string describing a buddy's account

ADD_BUDDY_STRING.comment: The title for the view to add a buddy

ADVANCED_STRING.comment: String to describe advanced set of settings

ALLOW_PLAIN_TEXT_AUTHENTICATION_STRING.comment: Setting name for allowing authentication to happen in plain text or in the clear

ALLOW_SSL_HOSTNAME_MISMATCH_STRING.comment: Title for settings cell on whether or not the XMPP library should allow SSL hostname mismatch

AVAILABLE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown in line for users that are available

AVAILABLE_STRING.comment: Label in buddy list for users that are available

AWAY_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown in line for users that are away

AWAY_STRING.comment: Label in buddy list for users that are away

BASIC_STRING.comment: string to describe basic set of settings

BLOCK_AND_REMOVE_STRING.comment: The String for a buddy to block and remove a buddy from the buddy list

BLOCK_STRING.comment: The String for a button to block a buddy

BUDDY_INFO_STRING.comment: The title for the view that shows detailed buddy info

BUDDY_LIST_STRING.comment: Title for the buddy list tab

CANCEL_ENCRYPTED_CHAT_STRING.comment: Shown when ending an encrypted chat session

CHAT_INSTRUCTIONS_LABEL_STRING.comment: Instructions on how to start using the program
CHAT_INSTRUCTIONS_LABEL_STRING.string: Log in on the Settings page (found on top right corner of buddy list) and then select a buddy from the Buddy List to start chatting.

CHAT_STATE_ACTIVE_STRING.comment: String to be displayed when a buddy is Active

CHAT_STATE_COMPOSING_STRING.comment: String to be displayed when a buddy is currently composing a message

CHAT_STATE_GONE_STRING.comment: String to be displayed when a buddy is inactive for an extended period of time

CHAT_STATE_INACTVIE_STRING.comment: String to be displayed when a buddy has become inactive

CHAT_STATE_PAUSED_STRING.comment: String to be displayed when a buddy has stopped composing and text has been entered

CLEAR_CHAT_HISTORY_STRING.comment: String shown in dialog for removing chat history

CONNECTED_STRING.comment: Whether or not account is logged in

CONNECT_FACEBOOK_STRING.comment: Button label for connecting a Facebook account

CONTRIBUTE_TRANSLATION_STRING.comment: label for a link to contribute a new translation

CONVERSATION_NOT_SECURE_WARNING_STRING.comment: Warn user that the current chat is not secure
CONVERSATION_NOT_SECURE_WARNING_STRING.string: Warning: This chat is not encrypted

CONVERSATION_NO_LONGER_SECURE_STRING.comment: Warn user that the current chat is no longer secure
CONVERSATION_NO_LONGER_SECURE_STRING.string: The conversation with %@ is no longer secure.

CONVERSATION_SECURE_AND_VERIFIED_WARNING.comment: Warns user that the current chat is secure and verified
CONVERSATION_SECURE_AND_VERIFIED_WARNING.string: This chat is secured and verified

CONVERSATION_SECURE_WARNING_STRING.comment: Warns user that the current chat is secure

DELETE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_ACCOUNT_TITLE_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to delete the stored account information

DELETE_CONVERSATIONS_ON_DISCONNECT_TITLE.comment: Title for automatic conversation deletion setting

DELIVERED_STRING.comment: Shows in the chat view when a message has been delivered

DISCONNECTED_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown when user is disconnected

DISCONNECTED_TITLE_STRING.comment: Title of alert when user is disconnected from protocol

DISCONNECTION_WARNING_STRING.comment: Warn user that conversation will be deleted after leaving it
DISCONNECTION_WARNING_STRING.string: When you leave this conversation it will be deleted forever.

DISCONNECTION_WARNING_TITLE_STRING.comment: Title for setting about showing a warning before disconnection

DISCONNECT_FACEBOOK_STRING.comment: button label for disconnecting Facebook account

HOSTNAME_STRING.comment: Label text for hostname field on login scree

DONATE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown when about to donate
DONATE_MESSAGE_STRING.string: Your donation will help fund the continued development of ChatSecure.

DONE_STRING.comment: Title for button to press when user is finished

DO_NOT_DISTURB_STRING.comment: Default message when a user status is set to do not disturb

EMAIL_STRING.comment: The string describing account name or email address for a buddy

ERROR_STRING.comment: Title of error message pop-up box

EXPIRATION_STRING.comment: Message displayed in Notification Manager when session will expire in one minute
EXPIRATION_STRING.string: Background session will expire in one minute.

EXTENDED_AWAY_STRING.comment: Default message when a user status is set to extended away

FACEBOOK_HELP_STRING.comment: Text that makes it clear which username to use
FACEBOOK_HELP_STRING.string: Your Facebook username is not the email address that you use to login to Facebook

FONT_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_STRING.comment: description for what the font size setting affects
FONT_SIZE_DESCRIPTION_STRING.string: Size for font in chat view

FONT_SIZE_STRING.comment: Size for the font in the chat screen

GOOGLE_TALK_EXAMPLE_STRING.comment: example of a Google talk account

GROUPS_STRING.comment: The string describing a buddy's groups ... plural

GROUP_STRING.comment: The string describing a buddy's group

INCOMING_STATUS_MESSAGE.comment: prefix to show buddies status message in line on chat view

INFO_STRING.comment: Short for information, button title to get more information

INITIATE_ENCRYPTED_CHAT_STRING.comment: Shown when starting an encrypted chat session

JABBER_STRING.comment: the name for jabber, also include (XMPP) at the end

LANGUAGE_ALERT_TITLE_STRING.comment: String of title to alert user language is change

LANGUAGE_STRING.comment: string to bring up language selector

LOGOUT_FROM_AIM_STRING.comment: Ask user if they want to logout of OSCAR

LOGOUT_FROM_XMPP_STRING.comment: ask user if they want to log out of XMPP

MESSAGE_PLACEHOLDER_STRING.comment: just the word as a placeholder for the message text field")

NAME_STRING.comment: The string describing a buddy's display name

NOT_AVAILABLE_STRING.comment: Shown when a feature is not available, for example SMS

NOT_VERIFIED_STRING.comment: To let the user know the fingerprint as not been checked

NO_ACCOUNT_SAVED_STRING.comment: Message informing user that there are no accounts currently saved

OFFLINE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Message shown in line for users that are offline

OPTIONAL_STRING.comment: Hint text for domain field telling user this field is not required

OSCAR_FAIL_STRING.comment: Authentication failed, tell user to try again

OTHER_STRING.comment: Title for other miscellaneous settings group

PASSWORD_STRING.comment: Label text for password field on login screen

PENDING_APPROVAL_STRING.comment: String for XMPP buddies when adding buddy is pending

PORT_STRING.comment: Label for port number field for connecting to service

PROJECT_HOMEPAGE_STRING.comment: label for link to ChatSecure project website

QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_STRING.comment: Instructions label text underneath QR code
QR_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS_STRING.string: This QR Code contains a link to http://omniqrcode.com/q/chatsecure and will redirect to the App Store.

READ_STRING.comment: Title for action button on alert dialog, used as a verb in the present tense

RECENT_STRING.comment: Title for header of Buddy list view with Recent Buddies

REMEMBER_PASSWORD_STRING.comment: label for switch for whether or not we should save their password between launches

REMEMBER_USERNAME_STRING.comment: label for switch for whether or not we should save their username between launches

REMOVE_STRING.comment: The String for a button to remove a buddy from the buddy list

REQUIRED_STRING.comment: String to let user know a certain field like a password is required to create an account

REQUIRE_TLS_STRING.comment: Setting name for requiring a TLS connection

SAVE_STRING.comment: Title for button for saving a setting

SECURITY_WARNING_DESCRIPTION_STRING.string: Warning: Use with caution! This may reduce your security.

SELF_SIGNED_SSL_STRING.comment: string for settings to allow self signed SSL string

SEND_DELIVERY_RECEIPT_STRING.comment: String in login settings asking to send delivery receipts

SEND_TYPING_NOTIFICATION_STRING.comment: String in login settings asking to send typing notification

SHARE_MESSAGE_STRING.comment: Body of SMS or email when sharing a link to the app

SHARE_STRING.comment: Title for sharing a link to the app

SOURCE_STRING.comment: let users know source is on Github
SOURCE_STRING.string: Check out the source here on Github

SSL_MISMATCH_STRING.comment: string for settings to allow SSL mismatch

THEIR_FINGERPRINT_STRING.comment: the alleged fingerprint of their other person

USERNAME_STRING.comment: Label text for username field on login screen

USER_PASS_BLANK_STRING.string: You must enter a username and a password to login.

VERSION_STRING.comment: when displaying version numbers such as 1.0.0

XMPP_FAIL_STRING.string: Failed to connect to XMPP server. Please check your login credentials and internet connection and try again.

XMPP_PORT_FAIL_STRING.string: Domain needs to be set manually when specifying a custom port

OPPORTUNISTIC_OTR_SETTING_TITLE.comment: string for title yes/no setting for allowing opportunistic otr

DISMISS_STRING.comment: Text for button to dismiss alert view

XMPP_CERT_FAIL_STRING.string: There was an error validating the certificate for %@. This may indicate that someone is trying to intercept your communications.

CONNECT_ANYWAY_STRING.comment: Label for button when user wants to overide cautious security settings

errSSLClosedNoNotifyString.string: Server closed session with no notification

errSSLPeerAuthCompletedString.string: Peer cert is valid, or was ignored if verification disabled

errSSLClientCertRequestedString.string: Server has requested a client cert

SAVED_CERTIFICATES_STRING.comment: Title for listing the user saved SSL certificates

VALID_CERTIFICATE_STRING.comment: shown to show that the certificate was valid to the system

LOCKED_SECURE_STRING.comment: Title to let user know that the OTR fingerprint has not been checked
LOCKED_SECURE_STRING.string: The conversation is secure and the fingerprint is verfied

iOS_SSL_ERROR_PART2_STRING.comment: Directions to the system software update

CREATING_ACCOUNT_STRING.comment: Title for progress of creating a new account

IN_BAND_ERROR_STRING.string: The XMPP server does not support in-band registration

TOR_WARNING_MESSAGE_STRING.string: Tor is an experimental feature, please use with caution.

CONNECTING_STRING.comment: String to state if an account is progress of creating a connection

OTRL_MSGEVENT_CONNECTION_ENDED_STRING.string: Message has not been sent because our buddy has ended the private conversation. We should either close the connection, or refresh it.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_SETUP_ERROR_STRING.string: A private conversation could not be set up.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_NOT_IN_PRIVATE_STR.string: Received an encrypted message but cannot read it because no private connection is established yet.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_UNREADABLE_STRING.comment: Error string for OTR message string

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_MALFORMED_STRING.string: The message received contains malformed data.

OTRL_MSGEVENT_RCVDMSG_FOR_OTHER_INSTANCE.string: Received and discarded a message intended for another instance.

DUPLICATE_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE_STRING.string: There already exists an account with this username.

ACCOUNT_DISCONNECTED_DESCRIPTION_STRING.string: Please log into this account before managing requests.

OPEN_IN_TWITTER_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link in twitter app

TWITTER_STRING.comment: Name of the popular social tweeting site

OPEN_IN_FACEBOOK_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link in facebook app

GITHUB_STRING.comment: Name of popular web based hosting service

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_STRING.comment: Label for switch to save passphrase

REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text that describes what remembering your passphrase does
REMEMBER_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Your password will be stored in the iOS Keychain of this device only, and is only as safe as your device passphrase or pin. However, it will not persist during a device backup/restore via iTunes, so please don't forget it, or you may lose your conversation history.

COMPOSE_STRING.comment: Label for text field where you compose a new message

SEARCH_STRING.comment: Label for text field where you search for a buddy

HELP_TRANSLATE_STRING.comment: Label for button to open link to translate app

ABOUT_VERSION_STRING.comment: Label for button to show version numbers and licenses

CREATED_BY_STRING.comment: Start of sentence that will be followed by names

NEXT_STRING.comment: Label for button to go to next step

SKIP_STRING.comment: Label for button to skip this step

UNLOCK_STRING.comment: Label for button to unlock app

FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_STRING.comment: Label for button when you've forgotten the passphrase

FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.comment: Text describing what happens when the user has forgotten the passphrase
FORGOT_PASSPHRASE_INFO_STRING.string: Because the database contents is encrypted with your passphrase, you've lost access to your data and will need to delete and reinstall ChatSecure to continue. Password managers like 1Password or MiniKeePass can be helpful for generating and storing strong passwords.
